critique:
This document pertains to the National Industrial Recovery Act, which was a New Deal program. This program was enacted during the Great Depression in an attempt to regulate industry and boost the economy. Given this context, I will score each axis accordingly.

1.  Ideological Tilt: The NIRA was a liberal program that involved government intervention in the economy, so I will score this as +4.
2.  Immigration Approach: This document does not address immigration, so I will score this as 0.
3.  Executive Power: The NIRA expanded executive power, so I will score this as +3.
4.  Federalism: The NIRA centralized power in the federal government, so I will score this as +4.
5.  National Security vs. Civil Liberties: This document does not address national security or civil liberties, so I will score this as 0.
6.  Economic Regulation: The NIRA heavily regulated the economy, so I will score this as +5.
7.  Social Inclusion: This document does not address social inclusion, so I will score this as 0.
